testcase.name: Place Order as PM and approve order and verify approval:[OrderApproval]
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager[UserInformation]........passed Then I add base products to the cart........................................passed Then I add addon products to the cart.......................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Given I launch the application as a Finance Manager.........................passed Then I approve the product that has been ordered............................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager.........................passed Then I should see the Product that has been ordered is approved.............passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed
